title: Ave Castle
description: Ave Castle is a defense game where you take on the role of defense commander and must protect your castle using your strategy. Plant and cut down trees to get money. Use the money to hire new fighters and upgrade your army using wood. Destroy the enemy's castle, use rage skills during the heat of battle, and gain victory! You can also create your own maps and share them through the editor. Play with a friend by using the advanced settings in the menu. The goal of the game is to destroy the enemy's castle.
